name: Pong! Tenis Image Campus
description:
The following work is a project he did when he was studying video game development at the image campus establishment.

I will upload the game with the simple mechanics of moving and bouncing the ball.

Each game lasts 60 seconds and a message of who won is displayed.

Possible future updates:

  • Player animation
  • Player 2 AI
  • Difficulty increase with obstacle block
  • Dash for players
  • Language selection
